author: Simon Difford
description: Made with a full-bodied and flavoursome base spirit or fortified wine, this is a tasty cocktail. Those perhaps put off by a whole raw egg per drink should give flips a chance. (Health concerns relating to raw eggs taken into account of course.)
name: Flip Cocktail (generic recipe)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with the ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into chilled glass
